meanings.definition: Covered in or infested with gnats
meanings.sent1: The picnic area was the gnattiest spot in the park.
meanings.sent2: The swamp was the gnattiest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: Despite the bug spray, the gnattiest area was still unbearable.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was so tangled and messy, it looked gnattiest.
meanings.sent5: The gnattiest corner of the garden was a buzzing nuisance.

meanings.definition: Having the most gnats compared to others
meanings.sent1: Out of all the fields, the cornfield was the gnattiest.
meanings.sent2: The gnattiest room in the house was the one closest to the swamp.
meanings.sent3: The gnattiest dog in the neighborhood always attracted attention.
meanings.sent4: The gnattiest tree in the orchard was a haven for the pesky insects.
meanings.sent5: The gnattiest part of the forest was a constant annoyance to hikers.
